name: At the Hedge of Fury
description:
Time to put those green thumbs to work! With proper care and attention, you can transform your lawn into a lush oasis. Not at all like that grimy, old O’Reilly’s sad excuse for a lawn next door. Of course, you can always just chuck something in his stupid face instead…

How to play For Playstation the inputs are:

X to Dash
Square to Pick Up

For Keyboard the inputs are:

Player 1:
WASD to Move
E to Pick Up
Space to Dash

Player 2:
Arrows to Move
AltGr (right cmd on ma

c) to Pick Up
Right ctrl (right alt on mac) to Dash

Sadly you can't offend with PS5 or Keyboard control right now.

Features

🎮 Xbox and PS5 controller support (optimized for xbox tho).

⌨️ Keyboard support.

🐐 GOATS!

Known issues!

⚠️ If you play with only one controller plugged in, you won't trigger the game over screen and have to start over manually.

⚠️ You can't offend with PS5 or Keyboard control right now.

⚠️ You have to navigate the menus with a mouse or trackpad.
